attributes.action: allow the British Forces to wear ALL medals awarded to them, be it NATO, UN or those awarded by other countries.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is for those of us who believe our Forces should be able to wear and show pride in what they have accomplished. Currently our forces can only wear those medals issued by HMG but surely those medals awarded by NATO, UN and other countries should be able to be worn with pride too?
